Uses of Package
org.apache.lucene.tests.search

  • Packages that use org.apache.lucene.tests.search 
    Package Description
    org.apache.lucene.tests.search
    Support for testing search components.
  • Classes in org.apache.lucene.tests.search used by org.apache.lucene.tests.search 
    Class Description
    BaseRangeFieldQueryTestCase.Range
    base class for range verification
    BaseRangeFieldQueryTestCase.Range.QueryType
    supported query relations
    DummyTotalHitCountCollector
    A dummy version of TotalHitCountCollector that doesn't shortcut using Weight.count(org.apache.lucene.index.LeafReaderContext).
    FixedBitSetCollector
    Collector that accumulates matching docs in a FixedBitSet
    MatchesTestBase.TermMatch
    Encapsulates a term position, start and end offset
    ShardSearchingTestBase.NodeState
    Simulated shard node under test
    ShardSearchingTestBase.NodeState.ShardIndexSearcher
    Matches docs in the local shard but scores based on aggregated stats ("mock distributed scoring") from all nodes.
